FAQ / Wave 5 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

End Hostilities

  1. Post WotC: Alpha Trion Protocols
    Does the bot mode ability on     Motormaster still trigger when my opponent reveals an End Hostilities? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols Wave 2 FAQ]
    No, it would be unable to trigger cause your oranges would be blues so your attack will not meet the flipped icons requirement. Note: Your own Belligerence would also cause the ability to fail.
